message.content: {"given_definition_quality":77,"better_definition":"early; before the usual time","sentence":"他早上学习。","image_prompt":"A young man studying at a desk by sunrise, sunlight coming through a window, city skyline visible, everything in soft apocalypse animation style, gentle pastel colors, slightly surreal atmosphere, hints of a quiet, post-apocalyptic world with overgrown buildings outside the window.","sentence_translation":"He studies in the early morning."}
